description: Tracks when a finding in one research area triggers work elsewhere inside TASK_MANAGERS/RESEARCHES/.

entries.trigger: High-performing tutorial flagged for transcription and social amplification
entries.notes: Record session IDs, report paths, and any linked task IDs once the pipeline runs.

guidelines: Add a new entry whenever research files in one folder require updates in another folder (e.g., Video → Tools, SMM → ToDo).
Use status values: pending, in-progress, complete.
Reference artifacts with paths relative to TASK_MANAGERS/RESEARCHES/.
